Title: Relates to requiring mental hygiene entities review fiscal management practices of service provider applicants
Summary: Requires that the Office of Mental Health and the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities give consideration to the fiscal management practices of an applicant to operate a mental hygiene facility or program as part of the review of such individual's character and competence.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to review of a provider's previous financial practices
